title: conda downloads from cuda75 channel
body_html:
I am using pytorch with CUDA 8.0

When I run conda install -c soumith pytorch the downloaded package is 0.1.12-py35_1cu75 soumith instead of the cu80 version. I have to download and install locally to get the correct version.

What is way to get the correct version using the conda command ?
